title: Guided Utilization Strategies to Enhance the Educational Integration Effects of LLMs in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and LMS (Learning Management System) usage experience
context.additional_context: An experimental design for intermediate domain experts (medical/legal/technical professionals) to explore educational integration effects of LLMs in language curriculum development

learning_goals: Learners improve academic writing quality by over 20% by applying critical writing strategies using Large Language Models (LLMs).
Learners acquire self-regulated learning strategies during LLM usage, resulting in a 15% or higher increase in academic engagement survey scores.
Based on interaction experiences with LLMs, learners enhance stress-coping abilities, achieving over 10% improvement in mental well-being metrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
